comments_since_last_sample.body: This lady totally gets it! God bless her!

Injustice evil laws against people.  This is the evil sign of the time in a society.  When justice returns people are happy. The present govt fails to see their own misery, pretending all is well to hell in blindness.

My wife was asked why she wanted a different position at Citibank. She was honest and mentioned a few things including “work life balance” and the interviewer just frowned. This was around 2016 before all this. The biggest stress is the commute…45 minutes to an hour plus employers wanting people to stay late to change the font on a PowerPoint slide despite them knowing full well the employee needs to pick up their kids before 6pm. Anyway… Good video. 🙂👌🏻
